sentences.en: After changing the bed, I would fall asleep quickly.
sentences.cn: 换了床单，我很快就能睡着。

sentences.en: Apart from two men on watch in the engine-room, everyone was asleep.
sentences.cn: 除了两个人在机房值班外，其他人都在睡觉。

sentences.en: As we fall asleep the amplitude of brain waves slowly becomes greater.
sentences.cn: 进入睡眠状态时，我们的脑电波振幅慢慢变大。

sentences.en: He fell asleep just past midnight with tolerable ease.
sentences.cn: 他刚过午夜就睡着了，睡得还算安稳。

sentences.en: He was already asleep in the bed, which smelled faintly of mildew.
sentences.cn: 他已经在略带霉味的床上睡着了。

sentences.en: He was asleep there, curled up in the fetal position.
sentences.cn: 他像胎儿一样蜷曲地睡在那儿。

sentences.en: His eyes were shut and he seemed to have fallen asleep.
sentences.cn: 他眼睛闭着，似乎睡着了。

sentences.en: Michelle had fallen asleep with her head against his shoulder.
sentences.cn: 米歇尔睡着了，头靠在他的肩上。

sentences.en: One or two listeners had fallen asleep while the President was speaking.
sentences.cn: 总统讲话时有一两名听众睡着了。

sentences.en: Sam snuggled down in his pillow and fell asleep.
sentences.cn: 萨姆舒服地枕着枕头进入了梦乡。

sentences.en: She buried her head under the covers, pretending to be asleep.
sentences.cn: 她把头埋到被子底下，假装睡着了。

sentences.en: Sister Francesca entered the chapel, took her seat, and promptly fell asleep.
sentences.cn: 弗朗西丝卡修女走进小教堂，坐下来，很快就睡着了。

sentences.en: The boys are curled asleep in the small bedroom upstairs.
sentences.cn: 男孩们蜷缩在楼上的小卧室里睡熟了。

sentences.en: The hypnotic state actually lies somewhere between being awake and being asleep.
sentences.cn: 催眠状态实际上介乎清醒和睡眠之间。

sentences.en: When he went upstairs five minutes later, she was fast asleep.
sentences.cn: 他5分钟后上楼时，她已睡熟。

phrases.tran_cn: (北美 非正式)不专心的，不留神的；不活跃的
